notes.text:
This update for sqlite3 to version 3.27.2 fixes the following issue:

Security issue fixed: 

- CVE-2018-20346: Fixed a remote code execution vulnerability in FTS3 (Magellan) (bsc#1119687).

Release notes: https://www.sqlite.org/releaselog/3_27_2.html
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: SQLite before 3.25.3, when the FTS3 extension is enabled, encounters an integer overflow (and resultant buffer overflow) for FTS3 queries that occur after crafted changes to FTS3 shadow tables, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by leveraging the ability to run arbitrary SQL statements (such as in certain WebSQL use cases), aka Magellan.
notes.title: CVE description
